meanings.definition: A tropical fruit with red spiky skin and sweet white flesh.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious rambutan for the first time today.
meanings.sent2: The market was selling fresh rambutans at a great price.
meanings.sent3: The rambutan rolled off the table and surprised everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweetness of a ripe rambutan.
meanings.sent5: The rambutan's spiky skin made it look like a tiny sea creature.

meanings.definition: The tree that produces the rambutan fruit.
meanings.sent1: The rambutan tree in our backyard is full of ripe fruits.
meanings.sent2: We planted a new rambutan tree next to the mango tree.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels love to climb the rambutan tree and play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The branches of the rambutan tree reached towards the sky like eager children.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the rambutan tree rustled in the gentle breeze.
